mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CARTS WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND OPT_NO=#{optNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARTS (USER_ID , OPT_NO , PROD_NO , NOW_CNT ) VALUES (#{userId}, #{optNo}, #{prodNo}, #{nowCnt})
mapper.select: SELECT c.USER_ID, c.OPT_NO, c.PROD_NO, c.NOW_CNT, p.prod_title,p.prod_image, p.prod_price, op.opt_FIRST, op.opt_second, op.opt_stock FROM carts c, products p, PROD_OPTIONS op WHERE 1=1 AND c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.prod_no = p.prod_no AND c.opt_no = op.opt_no
